title: UPDATE 1-Fortress says Novogratz to exit at year end, buys back his shares
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
BOSTON, Oct 13 (Reuters) - Fortress Investment Group said on Tuesday one-time star investor Michael Novogratz, who runs the firm's strugglin...
